Package de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids.Simple

Class FluidBlock

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.helper.BlockInfo
de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids.Simple.FluidBlock
public class FluidBlock
extends BlockInfo
This class represents a fluid block in the world.
Author:
Marius Tuschl, Florian Loher

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private FluidState fluidState  
    private short type  
    private boolean[] visibleSides  
    private WorldInteraction worldInteraction  

    Fields inherited from class de.oth.blocklib.helper.BlockInfo

    additionalData, facing, healthPoints, metaInfo, pos

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo)
    Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState) but uses the additional data of the blockInfo to determine the fluid state.
    FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, short type)
    Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState, short) but uses the additional data of the blockInfo to determine the fluid state.
    FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, Vector2i direction, short fluidLevel)
    Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState) but constructs a fluid state from a direction vector and a fluid level.
    FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, Vector2i direction, short fluidLevel, short type)
    Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState, short) but constructs a fluid state from a direction vector and a fluid level.
    FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, FluidState fluidState)
    Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState, short) but uses the metaInfo of the blockInfo to determine the type.
    FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, FluidState fluidState, short type)
    Constructs a FluidBlock with the provided blockInfo, fluidState and type. the additional info in the blockInfo is overridden by the fluidState.

  • Constructor Details

    • FluidBlock

      public FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, Vector2i direction, short fluidLevel)
      Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState) but constructs a fluid state from a direction vector and a fluid level.
      Parameters:
      blockInfo - The BlockInfo to construct the fluid block from.
      direction - The direction in which the FluidBlock is flowing.
      fluidLevel - The height of the fluid.

    • FluidBlock

      public FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, FluidState fluidState)
      Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState, short) but uses the metaInfo of the blockInfo to determine the type.
      Parameters:
      blockInfo - The BlockInfo to construct the fluid block from.
      fluidState - The fluidState that overrides the additional data in the blockInfo.

    • FluidBlock

      public FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, FluidState fluidState, short type)
      Constructs a FluidBlock with the provided blockInfo, fluidState and type. the additional info in the blockInfo is overridden by the fluidState.
      Parameters:
      blockInfo - The BlockInfo to construct the fluid block from.
      fluidState - The fluidState that overrides the additional data in the blockInfo.
      type - The block type of the block.

    • FluidBlock

      public FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo)
      Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState) but uses the additional data of the blockInfo to determine the fluid state.
      Parameters:
      blockInfo - The BlockInfo to construct the fluid block from.

    • FluidBlock

      public FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, Vector2i direction, short fluidLevel, short type)
      Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState, short) but constructs a fluid state from a direction vector and a fluid level.
      Parameters:
      blockInfo - The BlockInfo to construct the fluid block from.
      direction - The direction in which the FluidBlock is flowing.
      fluidLevel - The height of the fluid.
      type - The block type of the block.

    • FluidBlock

      public FluidBlock​(BlockInfo blockInfo, short type)
      Constructs a FluidBlock like FluidBlock(BlockInfo, FluidState, short) but uses the additional data of the blockInfo to determine the fluid state.
      Parameters:
      blockInfo - The BlockInfo to construct the fluid block from.
      type - The block type of the block.

      public void setDirection​(Vector2i direction)
      Sets the direction of the fluid block and changes the additional data in the world appropriately.
      Parameters:
      direction - The new flow direction of the block.

    • getFluidLevel

      public short getFluidLevel()

    • setFluidLevel

      public void setFluidLevel​(short fluidLevel)
      Sets the fluid height of the block and changes the additional data in the world appropriately.
      Parameters:
      fluidLevel - The height level of the fluid.
